alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pearl River County through 300 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcneil, or 7 miles southwest of Poplarville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poplarville, Crossroads and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
